Summary: Bell shaped UFO seen in broad daylight.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving my employer's truck on i-81 north, going around a turn near the towns of hanover\ashley pa, when i saw this fast moving, bright bell-shaped object in the distance, traveling south. as it moved closer to me, i could clearly see it's shape. it was bell-shaped and it may have been either white, silver or gray in color. it was hard to tell because the sun was reflecting off of it, but yet i didn't have to squint my eyes to look at it. it did not have any visible windows or any type of wings, tail or propeller. it did not make a sound or leave an exhaust trail. it was moving at a good speed that when i pulled out my cell phone to take a picture, it had already passed. i was in the left-hand lane and couldn't pull over. i wasn't able to follow the object in my side mirror because i was rounding a turn. at first i couldn't believe what i saw, but then as it sank in, i was really excited. i saw my first ufo. i just wish i was able to get pictures.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ashley
There were no other sightings in Ashley on or around July 10th 2008
